page.title: 18RECRATION GAMES SURVEY LCING
page.content: We sent a survey around our school to discover the most popular children's games.We were sent details of many games played using a ball eg.rounders. The most popular activity for boys and girls was sport.The most interesting game we found was'Three bad eggs'.The rules are simple;one player is on andthey have the ball.The players who aren't on run around in an area while the player who is on throws the ball into the air and lets it bounce.He then calls a name and steps the number of letters in that name. they throw the ball and call the name again.If the ball hits the named person then he becomes on.If the ball misses then the original player stays on. Other interesting games included; {CONTINUED ON PAGE 19.}
